meanings.definition: To discharge feces from the body.
meanings.sent1: The cat defecates in the litter box.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the dog defecates in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The bird defecates on the car windshield, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: The factory defecates pollutants into the river, harming the environment.
meanings.sent5: The baby defecates loudly, causing everyone to laugh.

meanings.definition: To eliminate waste material from the bowels.
meanings.sent1: After eating, the rabbit defecates small pellets.
meanings.sent2: He defecates regularly to maintain good digestive health.
meanings.sent3: The bear defecates in the woods, following its natural instincts.
meanings.sent4: The volcano defecates molten lava, creating a fiery spectacle.
meanings.sent5: The cow defecates large piles of manure, fertilizing the soil.
